statements: DELETE FROM referee_data WHERE name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM referee_data WHERE age > 30 AND nationality = 'German';
DELETE FROM match_rules WHERE rule_category = 'Fouls' AND rule_description LIKE '%violent%';
DELETE FROM Matches WHERE referee_id = 1 AND match_date = '2022-06-30'
DELETE FROM DisciplinaryDecisions WHERE decision_id IN (SELECT decision_id FROM DisciplinaryDecisions WHERE rule_id = 3)
DELETE FROM matches WHERE date = '2022-01-15' AND location = 'Stadium ABC';
